articles.author: Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Russia nearly shot down British spy plane near Ukraine, leaked document says - The Washington Post
articles.description: The incident occurred months before a Russian fighter collided with an American MQ-9 drone over the Black Sea.

articles.author: India Today Video Desk
articles.title: NASA-SpaceX launch: How this device will track Earth's pollution levels from space - India Today - India Today
articles.description: A rocket, launched jointly by NASA and SpaceX, carries a device that will decide whether you can go out for a run or not. Tropospheric Emissions: Monitoring of Pollution or TEMPO is the first space instrument to measure air quality over North America hourly. …
